intro: Pagetia, commonly known as the common pagetia, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Polygonaceae. It consists of several species that are typically found in moist, temperate regions. The plants are characterized by their upright growth habit and clusters of small, clustered flowers. Their leaves are usually lance-shaped and have a distinct, rough texture. Pagetia species are often used in ornamental gardening due to their attractive foliage and modest flowering display.
